original_text: Therefore also I have lent him to the Lord; as long as he liveth he shall be lent to the Lord. And he worshipped the Lord there.
korean_text: 그러므로 나도 그를 여호와께 드리되 그의 평생을 여호와께 드리나이다 하고 그가 거기서 여호와께 경배하니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore also I have lent him to the Lord
he shall be lent to the Lord
And he worshipped the Lord there
